title: Mekong River Adventure
description: A magical story about Mai and her encounter with a talking island on the Mekong River, as they journey together from the river to the sea, discovering friendship and the meaning of home.

pages.title: By the Mekong River
pages.description: Mai likes to sit by the Mekong River where the water flows gently and coconut trees cast shadows on the water

sentences.Mai thích ngồi bên bờ sông Mê Kông, nơi: Mai liked to sit by the Mekong River, where the water flowed gently and rows of coconut trees cast shadows on the water surface.

pages.title: Evening Sounds
pages.description: Every evening, Mai listens to the distant sound of motorboats mixed with birds calling in the wind

sentences.Mỗi buổi chiều, cô nghe tiếng ghe máy xa: Every evening, she heard the distant sound of motorboats mixed with birds calling their flocks in the wind.

pages.title: Something Floating
pages.description: On a bright sunny day, Mai discovers something floating in the middle of the river

sentences.Một ngày nắng rực rỡ, Mai phát hiện giữa: On a bright sunny day, Mai discovered something floating in the middle of the river, drifting closer.

pages.title: A Small Island
pages.description: As it gets closer, Mai realizes it's a small island covered with young coconut trees and wild flowers

sentences.Khi lại gần, cô nhận ra đó là một hòn đả: As it came closer, she realized it was a small island, covered with young coconut trees and wild flowers.

pages.title: The Island's Search
pages.description: The island turns slowly, as if searching for something

sentences.Hòn đảo xoay chậm chạp, như thể đang tìm: The island turned slowly, as if searching for something.

pages.title: Mai's Greeting
pages.description: Mai calls out to the small island, asking where it came from

sentences.\"Chào hòn đảo nhỏ kia!\" Mai gọi to. \": "Hello, little island!" Mai called out loudly. "Where did you come from?"

pages.title: The Island Speaks
pages.description: A soft voice rises from the wind, saying the island is lost and was blown away from its homeland

sentences.Một giọng nói khẽ vang lên từ trong gió:: A soft voice rose from the wind: "I'm lost... the wind blew me away from my homeland."

pages.title: Mai's Surprise
pages.description: Mai's mouth drops open — this is the first time she's heard an island speak

sentences.Mai há hốc miệng — đây là lần đầu tiên c: Mai's mouth dropped open — this was the first time she had heard an island speak.

pages.title: Getting on the Island
pages.description: Without thinking much, Mai rows her small wooden boat closer and steps onto the island

sentences.Không suy nghĩ nhiều, cô chèo chiếc xuồn: Without thinking much, she rowed her small wooden boat closer and stepped onto the island.

pages.title: Soft Ground
pages.description: The ground under her feet is soft like sand, and coconut water falls like clear musical drops

sentences.Mặt đất dưới chân cô mềm như cát, và nướ: The ground under her feet was soft like sand, and coconut water fell like clear musical drops.

pages.title: Mai's Promise
pages.description: Mai promises to help the island find its way home

sentences.\"Đừng lo, tớ sẽ giúp cậu tìm lại nhà,\": "Don't worry, I'll help you find your way home," Mai said and smiled.

pages.title: The Island's Joy
pages.description: The island is happy, coconut trees sway and leaves sing rustling in the sunlight

sentences.Hòn đảo vui mừng, những cây dừa đung đưa: The island was happy, coconut trees swayed and leaves sang rustling in the sunlight.

pages.title: Floating Market
pages.description: They drift together past the floating market, where vendors exclaim about the girl riding a talking island

sentences.Họ cùng nhau trôi qua chợ nổi, nơi các c: They drifted together past the floating market, where vendors exclaimed: "Look, the little girl is riding a talking island!"

pages.title: Shy Island
pages.description: Mai laughs and waves, while the island shyly hides behind a light mist

sentences.Mai cười, vẫy tay, còn hòn đảo thì thẹn: Mai laughed and waved, while the island shyly hid itself behind a light mist.

pages.title: Fireflies at Night
pages.description: Night falls and thousands of fireflies emerge, lighting up the sky like a garden of stars on the water

sentences.Đêm xuống, hàng ngàn đom đóm bay ra, thắ: Night fell, thousands of fireflies emerged, lighting up the sky like a garden of stars on the water.

pages.title: Homesickness
pages.description: The island softly says it misses home and wonders if Mother River still remembers it

sentences.\"Tớ nhớ nhà lắm,\" hòn đảo khẽ nói. \"K: "I miss home so much," the island said softly. "I wonder if Mother River still remembers me."

pages.title: Mai's Comfort
pages.description: Mai places her hand on the coconut tree trunk and reassures the island

sentences.Mai đặt tay lên thân cây dừa: \"Cậu cứ t: Mai placed her hand on the coconut tree trunk: "Just believe, the Mekong River always welcomes what belongs to it."

pages.title: Approaching the Sea
pages.description: The next morning, they see the water gradually becoming salty, with the fresh smell of sea breeze

sentences.Sáng hôm sau, họ thấy mặt nước dần chuyể: The next morning, they saw the water gradually becoming salty, with the fresh smell of sea breeze rushing in.

pages.title: Finding Home
pages.description: Where the river meets the sea, the island trembles slightly as coconut roots shine and slowly sink into the sand

sentences.Ở nơi sông gặp biển, hòn đảo khẽ rung lê: Where the river meets the sea, the island trembled slightly — coconut roots sparkled and slowly sank into the sand.

pages.title: Farewell
pages.description: Mai sits in her boat, watching the island gradually settle, hearing a soft whisper of thanks in the waves

sentences.Mai ngồi trên xuồng, nhìn hòn đảo dần dầ: Mai sat in her boat, watching the island gradually settle, hearing a soft whisper of thanks in the waves: "Mai, thank you... friend of the river."
